info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Return the dimension index after a subsetting. Return 0 in case the original id has been filtered in subetting
[Parameters] - id : original dimension id. - total size : size of all dimensions in table (listed from the most inner dimensions to the target dimension). - list of parameters related to dimensions to be subset; for each dimension three parameter should be given: -- subset string : indexes to be extracted; -- block size : product of the dimensions that vary more quickly than the target dimension; -- dimension size : size of the target dimension.
[Return type] Long-long.
[Examples] Return the dimension index associated to 'id' after the application of a subset '2:3' on a binary array of 10 elements. oph_id_of_subset(id,10,'2:3',1,10)
